name: places/ChIJfxsqGKNYwokRb6TiKcEBiSU
formattedAddress: 1100 Park Ave, New York, NY 10128, USA
adrFormatAddress: 1100 Park Ave, New York, NY 10128-1202, USA

originalText.text:
I met dr sultan 10 years ago. Im 5’6 114’ and works out 4-6 days a week. After 4 kids my stomach was not the same and no workout will fix it. I went in for a tummy tuck and complained about my hips a little. He recommended tummy tuck which he says will give me great results and some liposuction of the outer thigh. We also did breast augmentation. After four hour surgery, I was released to recovery room and then a private room with a private nurse that I booked through him. Months after surgery neither my stomach or my implants looked right. I went back to Dr. Sultan he said I’m sorry your body fooled me, I can revise the  surgery free of charge. He said he will do the Tummy Tuck and the breast augmentation all over again. This was not an easy surgery but I choose to go under again. The second time I went back after a few months and I said that dr. Sultan it still doesn’t look right he said go to the gym. He left me speechless. He tried to take it back but the words came out. I went home and cried. My stomach didn’t look right and the liposuction that he did on my outer hips affected my buttocks. I went to see a doctor a year after surgery and they said that Dr. Sultan removed fat that supports the buttocks and he should’ve never touched it. I went to many drs to see if they can fix the mistake they said it can’t be fixed. For the last five years I can’t wear anything fitted, bathing suits are not an option and my buttocks shaped like a square. I’m 50 years now and I don’t want to leave my house.
I reached out to dr Sultan and he will not meet with me. Worst dr ever he ruined my body.
If you’re going to use dr Sultan be careful. If you have any questions message me here I can share pictures privately with you. They won’t be filtered like the ones they post

WORST DR EVER

originalText.text:
Dr Sultan reconstructed my nose after half my nose was removed due to a melanoma.
Nobody would ever ever know.. amazing work! A genius!

text.text:
Dr Sultan reconstructed my nose after half my nose was removed due to a melanoma.
Nobody would ever ever know.. amazing work! A genius!

originalText.text: I wish I had met Dr. Sultan under different circumstances but I was not that fortunate.  We first met in June, 2017  when at age 43  I had breast cancer and was planning for my bilateral mastectomy and reconstruction.  As you can imagine I was distraught and trying to think clearly and upon meeting DR. Sultan he immediately put me at ease with his clear expertise and his kind, compassionate way.  His wonderful staff squeezed me in for a consultation on a Friday late in the day, he stayed after hours to answer all of my questions and at the conclusion of our appointment  he told me that in the end i would be "cured and beautiful".   Well, he was right. Dr. Sultan held my hand every step of the way. His assistants are just as wonderful, knowledgeable, and caring  as he is. During what was the most harrowing experience of my life these people gave my the utmost confidence that I was in the very best of hands and that I was being taken care of by the BEST.  I told Dr Sultan just yesterday at a followup appointment that I loved him and he is a gift to the profession. I have referred countless people to him.  Oh and by the way, my reconstructed breasts look AMAZING!!!!!!!!!

originalText.text: I had a traumatic facial injury a few years ago. It required 13 surgeries to replace missing cartilage and tissue. I wish I had found Dr. Sultan (and his team) earlier in the process. Dr. Sultan is a very talented plastic surgeon and a solid human being. His perfectionism and kindness made for a comfortable situation and an amazing outcome. I’m very grateful.

text.text: I had a traumatic facial injury a few years ago. It required 13 surgeries to replace missing cartilage and tissue. I wish I had found Dr. Sultan (and his team) earlier in the process. Dr. Sultan is a very talented plastic surgeon and a solid human being. His perfectionism and kindness made for a comfortable situation and an amazing outcome. I’m very grateful.

originalText.text: Can’t say enough about how Dr Sultan was able to transform my body. I had a double mastectomy and reconstruction by another surgeon.   My breasts looked awful when I came to see him. He took on my difficult case without hesitation and he was not only able to fix my breasts but they look better then before my mastectomy.  Completely changed my life and finally feel whole again. The absolute best!!
